pages.text: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod based on making massive multiblock structures with an Industrial Revolution style.

Start off with making a 3x3 block of coke bricks then right clicking the centre with a engineers hammer, from there you put coal, or blocks, in to make coal coke and creosote oil, for treated wood, and the coal coke to make steel in a similar multiblock made of blast bricks.

Uses wire connected by relays to transfer power rather than cables which can be powering some of the only machines in the pack like a scanner, building gadget, and most of the multiblock machines it offers (some of which can offer infinite resources, auto-craft, and more!).
